title: TreeViewItem
body: It seems that TreeViewItem sets GlyphOpacity to 0 when the last child in the tree view node is deleted. This is wrong because it means that bindings to GlyphOpacity are ignored when the last child is deleted.

comments.body: You can work around this bug by registering a callback for change of TreeViewItem GlyphOpacity and testing for the correct value of GlyphOpacity. If the value is incorrect then raise a property notification for the property to which GlyphOpacity is bound.
